name: part_012
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs her original song 'Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der!!' during her graduation live.
MC section where Kanata thanks the audience and discusses her original song medley.
Kanata performs a quick costume change back to her original idol outfit.
Kanata introduces herself with her classic catchphrase.

subtitles.original: 土砂降りじゃねえだわ
subtitles.english: It's not a downpour.

subtitles.original: そんでビンボーっちじゃねえだわ
subtitles.english: And I'm not poor.

subtitles.original: 運搬児がバッチリ聴けてる
subtitles.english: The delivery boy can hear it perfectly.

subtitles.original: ニキになってる
subtitles.english: He's becoming a 'Niki'.

subtitles.original: かなたちゃん！
subtitles.english: Kanata-chan!

subtitles.original: 全身全霊ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Welcome with all your heart and soul.

subtitles.original: 高まるかい？いっそちゃんと共感して
subtitles.english: Is the excitement rising? Just empathize properly.

subtitles.original: 興奮し合おう　僕が呼んだもん
subtitles.english: Let's get excited together, because I called for it.

subtitles.original: 翻弄するんだもん　現実越えろ未来
subtitles.english: I'll toy with you, surpass reality, future!

subtitles.original: Ah 逆転も平気！スイッチ入れちゃった
subtitles.english: Ah, reversal is fine! I've flipped the switch.

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダラダーで
subtitles.english: Namely, with Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der.

subtitles.original: デモシモ面白がれること探し構えろ
subtitles.english: Even if, find something fun and get ready.

subtitles.original: 返事聴かせてくれ
subtitles.english: Let me hear your answer.

subtitles.original: 右左どこじゃない　突き抜けて行っちゃって
subtitles.english: Not right or left, just pierce through.

subtitles.original: 詰まりたくらんだら　発射オーライだ
subtitles.english: In short, if you've schemed, you're clear for takeoff.

subtitles.original: ワクワク寸前さ！
subtitles.english: On the verge of excitement!

subtitles.original: 聞いて、みんなと離れるのが寂しいのと
subtitles.english: Listen, I'm sad to be leaving everyone and...

subtitles.original: ガッキーの結婚が立ち直れてません
subtitles.english: I haven't recovered from Gakky's marriage yet.

subtitles.original: 僕をアイドルにしてくれてみんな本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for making me an idol!

subtitles.original: なんだよ、そんなこと言っちゃダメだ、おバカ！
subtitles.english: What, you can't say things like that, you dummy!

subtitles.original: わあ、すごい、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing, thank you!

subtitles.original: 響き合そうでんでんごまアウェイ
subtitles.english: Resonating, spin like a top, away.

subtitles.original: 虎視眈々でいたいだもん
subtitles.english: I want to be watchful for an opportunity.

subtitles.original: だって意気昂々だもん
subtitles.english: Because I'm in high spirits.

subtitles.original: 全方位がっつり当てが張っていらっしゃい
subtitles.english: Come with full force from all directions.

subtitles.original: いつでも心はちゃんと10代で
subtitles.english: My heart is always in its teens.

subtitles.original: いたいんだ好奇心絶えず熱心で
subtitles.english: I want to stay that way, with constant curiosity and enthusiasm.

subtitles.original: いたいんだって言い聞かせるんだ
subtitles.english: I tell myself I want to stay that way.

subtitles.original: 調子に乗ったらすぐ飽きられちゃうから
subtitles.english: Because if I get carried away, people will get tired of me soon.

subtitles.original: あー買い取んなら横暴どんと来い！ですって
subtitles.english: Ah, if you're buying, come at me with your tyranny!

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダラダーで
subtitles.english: Namely, with Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der.

subtitles.original: しがみつけ努力とは最後まで諦めないこと
subtitles.english: Cling to it, effort means not giving up until the end.

subtitles.original: 見守っておいて
subtitles.english: Please keep an eye on me.

subtitles.original: 本当はBaby　自信がないよ
subtitles.english: To be honest Baby, I have no confidence.

subtitles.original: 本当はBaby　不安ばかりで泣きそうだぜ
subtitles.english: To be honest Baby, I'm so anxious I could cry.

subtitles.original: おねがいBaby　くじけないって決めたの
subtitles.english: Please Baby, I've decided not to give up.

subtitles.original: だからBaby　挑戦したいよ未開の天地
subtitles.english: So Baby, I want to challenge uncharted territory.

subtitles.original: 無限のフィールで！
subtitles.english: In an infinite field!

subtitles.original: 全身全霊ちゃんと歓迎して
subtitles.english: Welcome with all your heart and soul.

subtitles.original: 高まるかい？いっそちゃんと共感して
subtitles.english: Is the excitement rising? Just empathize properly.

subtitles.original: 興奮し合おう　僕が呼んだもん
subtitles.english: Let's get excited together, because I called for it.

subtitles.original: 翻弄するんだもん　現実越えろ未来
subtitles.english: I'll toy with you, surpass reality, future!

subtitles.original: Ah 逆転も平気！スイッチ入れちゃった
subtitles.english: Ah, reversal is fine! I've flipped the switch.

subtitles.original: すなわち特者生存ワンダラダーで
subtitles.english: Namely, with Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der.

subtitles.original: でもしもおもしろがれること探し放題で
subtitles.english: And if, you can find as many fun things as you want.

subtitles.original: 無限のフィールだね
subtitles.english: It's an infinite field, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ハプニングしなくてもいい
subtitles.english: It's okay if nothing happens.

subtitles.original: ど真ん中一直線
subtitles.english: Straight through the center.

subtitles.original: つまりこれが僕の答えなんだ
subtitles.english: In short, this is my answer.

subtitles.original: 胸を張り今を生きるその意味を
subtitles.english: With pride, the meaning of living in the now.

subtitles.original: 明くる日もくるくる日も確かめ進め！
subtitles.english: Day after day, day after day, confirm it and move forward!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: みんなー、ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: えー、聴いていただいたのは、オリ曲メドレー、メドレーにしました。
subtitles.english: Well, what you just heard was an original song medley. I made it into a medley.

subtitles.original: 繋ぎましたよ。
subtitles.english: I connected them.

subtitles.original: そして「世界で一番のアイドル」、作詞をしました。
subtitles.english: And "The Best Idol in the World", I wrote the lyrics.

subtitles.original: この時は卒業だって考えてなかったから、
subtitles.english: At that time I wasn't even thinking about graduating,

subtitles.original: 本当に、あの、いっぱい聴いてほしい曲で、
subtitles.english: so it's a song I really want you to listen to a lot.

subtitles.original: そして「特者生存ワンダラダー！！」でした！
subtitles.english: And that was "Tokusha Seizon Wonder-la-der!!"

subtitles.original: はい、これを初めてね、出したね。え、オリジナル楽曲ですけれども。
subtitles.english: Yes, I released this for the first time. Well, it's an original song.

subtitles.original: ちょっと語りたいこといっぱいあるんですけど、
subtitles.english: There's a lot I want to talk about,

subtitles.original: やっぱりあの服だよね。
subtitles.english: but it's got to be that outfit, right?

subtitles.original: ってことで、1秒着替えてきました！
subtitles.english: So, I've done a one-second costume change!

subtitles.original: はい、やっぱりこれだよね、みんな。
subtitles.english: Yes, it has to be this, everyone.

subtitles.original: ヘイ、こんかなた！
subtitles.english: Hey, Kon-kanata!

subtitles.original: キャッチコピーは握力50キロ、ギュッギュに握りつぶしちゃうぞ。
subtitles.english: My catchphrase is: with a grip strength of 50kg, I'll crush you tight.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ4期生、かなたんこと天音かなたです！
subtitles.english: Hololive 4th generation, known as Kanatan, I'm Amane Kanata!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、録画...危ないことは、危ない橋は渡らないでおきまして、
subtitles.english: Right, so... recordings... let's not take any risks,

subtitles.original: 今のような、あの、感じでいきたいと思うんですけれども、
subtitles.english: I'd like to continue with this kind of vibe,

subtitles.original: もう本当にオリジナル楽曲は、フェスやイベント、ソロライブなど...
subtitles.english: but really, original songs at festivals, events, solo lives...
